column2: -  එකක්  සුදු  පාටයි,  අජනක්  එක  රතු  පාටට  හුරු  ජීප්  එකක්.  අජනක්  එක  ඩබල්  කැබ්  රථයක්.
අනික් එක ඔබ කිේවා නිලන්ෙ කියන ෙැනැත්ොජේ ොත්ො පාවිච්චි කරන වා නය කියලා?

column1: This  necessarily  throws  doubt  as  to  the  existence  of  the  double  cab  itself  at  the  vicinity  and
whether this evidence can be used against the 1st accused. The recognition of the double cab is
further  doubtful  as  this  witness,  when  allowed  to  identify  the  double  cab  in  the  High  Court
premises, failed to identify the double cab but merely stated that it is a similar double cab. He also
stated that he cannot even remember the colour of the double cab. The learned High Court Judge
has failed to consider this part of the evidence.
Page 1429 of the appeal brief in volume 2 is as follows;
